title.rendered: Pesto Chickpea & Chicken Orzo Meal Prepped Bowl

content.rendered:
If you’re looking to bring your lunch to work, school, or anywhere on the go, here’s one of my favorites because you can enjoy it cold!! Pesto, chickpea chicken orzo & arugula!!! So yummy, easy, nutritious and filling. ENJOY! 

The recipe:

Start by cooking the orzo according to the package instructions.

Meanwhile, dice the zucchinis into even-sized pieces and sauté them in a pan with a drizzle of olive oil, garlic salt, and pepper until they’re cooked to your liking.

Remove both the zucchinis and orzo from the heat and allow to cool before creating your meal prepped jars.

While waiting for the orzo and zucchini to cool, strain and rinse the chickpeas.

Now it’s time to assemble! Begin by layering the sauce at the bottom of each jar with pesto, a drizzle of olive oil, lemon juice, and a sprinkle of garlic salt and pepper.

Next, add in the chickpeas, shredded rotisserie chicken, cooked and cooled orzo, and zucchini. Top with pine nuts and arugula, and finish with your choice of Parmesan or feta cheese.

Seal the jars with lids and store them in the fridge for a ready-to-go lunch option!

When you’re ready to enjoy your meal, simply pour the contents of the jar into a bowl & enjoy!! xx

Pesto Chickpea & Chicken Orzo Meal Prepped Bowl

If you’re looking to bring your lunch to work, school, or anywhere on the go, here’s one of my favorites because you can enjoy it cold!! Pesto, chickpea chicken orzo & arugula!!! So yummy, easy, nutritious and filling. ENJOY! 
Print Recipe Add to Collection Go to Collections
Prep Time 15 minutes mins
Cook Time 15 minutes mins
Course Main Course, Salad
Cuisine American
Servings 2 large mason jars

Equipment

  • 2 large mason jars

Ingredients
  

  • 1 tablespoon pesto
  • 1/2 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1/3 lemon, squeezed
  • 1/4 teaspoon garlic salt
  • 1/4 teaspoon pepper
  • 1 cup chickpeas, (so 1/2 cup each jar)
  • 1 1/4 cup rotisserie chicken, shredded
  • 1 1/3 cup cooked orzo
  • 1 zucchini, diced, sauteed & cooled
  • 2 tablespoons pine nuts
  • 3 cups packed arugula
  • 1/2 cup grated parmesan, or crumbled feta

Instructions
 

  • Start by cooking the orzo according to the package instructions.
  • Meanwhile, dice the zucchinis into even-sized pieces and sauté them in a pan with a drizzle of olive oil, garlic salt, and pepper until they’re cooked to your liking.
  • Remove both the zucchinis and orzo from the heat and allow to cook before creating your meal prepped jars.
  • While waiting for the orzo and zucchini to cool, strain and rinse the chickpeas.
  • Now it's time to assemble! Begin by layering the sauce at the bottom of each jar with pesto, a drizzle of olive oil, lemon juice, and a sprinkle of garlic salt and pepper.
  • Next, add in the chickpeas, shredded rotisserie chicken, cooked and cooled orzo, and zucchini. Top with pine nuts and arugula, and finish with your choice of Parmesan or feta cheese.
  • Seal the jars with lids and store them in the fridge for a ready-to-go lunch option!
  • When you're ready to enjoy your meal, simply pour the contents of the jar into a bowl & enjoy!! xx

Video

@katieaustin

When the chickpeas are marinated in the pesto🤤 To make 2 large mason jars: -2 tablespoon pesto (1 in each) -1 tablespoon olive oil (1/2 in each) -1/3 of a lemon squeezed -1/2 teaspoon pepper & garlic salt -1 cup chickpeas (so half cup each) -1 1/4 cup rotisserie chicken -1 1/3 cup cooked orzo -1 whole zucchini- diced, sauteed and cooled -2 tablespoons pine nuts -3 cups packed arugula -1/2 cup parm or feta Save to try this next time you’re looking for a yummy meal prep idea! Xx

♬ vibey birds of a feather – Sunset Party
Keyword Arugula, Chicken, Chickpea, Orzo, Pesto, Zucchini
